name: To the Last
text: Your devotion to battle inspires you to fight competently until death claims you.
benefit: When you are disabled, you are not staggered, though performing standard actions still deals 1 point of damage to you. Taking a full-round action deals 2 points of damage to you.
staminaText: You can spend 1 stamina when disabled to take a standard action without losing a hit point.
